- [93mHarnessing[0m [93mDefect[0m-[93mInduced[0m [93mElectron[0m [93mTransfer[0m at [93mPt[0m/[93mh[0m-[93mBN[0m [92mInterfaces[0m for [93mUltra[0m-[93mDeep[0m [93mDiesel[0m [93mDesulfurization[0m.: [93mDefect[0m [92mengineering[0m [93mprovides[0m an [93meffective[0m [91mroute[0m to [93mtailor[0m the [93melectronic[0m [93mstructure[0m of [93mmetal[0m-[93msupport[0m [92minterfaces[0m for [93mcatalytic[0m [93mapplications[0m. [93mHere[0m [93mwe[0m [93mreport[0m a [93mdefect[0m-[93mrich[0m [93mPt[0m/[93mh[0m-[93mBN[0m-[93mv[0m [93mcatalyst[0m [93mobtained[0m by [93mselective[0m [93macid[0m [93metching[0m of [93mPtZn[0m/[93mh[0m-[93mBN[0m, which [93mintroduces[0m [93mabundant[0m [93mvacancies[0m and [93mmodulates[0m [93melectron[0m [93mtransfer[0m from [93mB[0m [93matoms[0m in [93mh[0m-[93mBN[0m to [93mPt[0m [93mnanoparticles[0m. [93mXPS[0m and [93mESR[0m [93manalysis[0m [93mreveal[0m that this [93melectron[0m [93mredistribution[0m [93mcreates[0m an [93melectron[0m-[93mrich[0m [93mPt[0m [93msurface[0m [93mcapable[0m of [93mefficiently[0m [93mactivating[0m [93mmolecular[0m [93moxygen[0m to [93msuperoxide[0m [93mspecies[0m. - [93mAg[0m [93mNPs[0m [93mloading[0m and [93multraviolet[0m [93mirradiation[0m [93mstrategies[0m for [93menhancing[0m the [93mperformance[0m of [93mWO[0m([93m3[0m)/[93mTi[0m([93m3[0m)[93mC[0m([93m2[0m)[93mT[0m([93mX[0m) [93mcomposites[0m in [93mdetecting[0m [93m2[0m-[93mheptanone[0m.: As a [93mtypical[0m [93mvolatile[0m [93morganic[0m [93mcompound[0m ([93mVOC[0m), [93m2[0m-[93mheptanone[0m [93mdetection[0m is [93mcritical[0m in [93mfood[0m [93mspoilage[0m [93mmonitoring[0m, [93mchemical[0m [93mproduction[0m [93msafety[0m [93mcontrol[0m, and [93menvironmental[0m [93mpollutant[0m [93mtracking[0m. [93mHowever[0m, [93mdeveloping[0m a [93m2[0m-[93mheptanone[0m [93mgas[0m [93msensor[0m with [93mhigh[0m [93msensitivity[0m at [93mroom[0m [93mtemperature[0m [93mremains[0m [93mchallenging[0m. This [93mstudy[0m [93mprepared[0m [93mWO[0m [93m3[0m /[93mTi[0m [93m3[0m [93mC[0m [93m2[0m [93mT[0m [93mX[0m [93mMXene[0m [93mcomposites[0m ([93mWT[0m-[93m50[0m) [93mvia[0m a [93msolvothermal[0m [93mmethod[0m and [92mconstructed[0m a [93mternary[0m [93mcomposite[0m [93mAg[0m/[93mWO[0m [93m3[0m /[93mTi[0m [93m3[0m [93mC[0m [93m2[0m [93mT[0m [93mX[0m -[93m50[0m ([93mAgWT[0m-[93m50[0m) by [93mloading[0m [93mAg[0m [93mnanoparticles[0m. The [93mgas[0m-[93msensing[0m [93mproperties[0m of [93mWT[0m-[93m50[0m, [93mAgWT[0m-[93m50[0m, and [93mWT[0m-[93m50[0m [93mexcited[0m by [93multraviolet[0m [93mlight[0m [93mtoward[0m [93m2[0m-[93mheptanone[0m were [95minvestigated[0m. [93mAgWT[0m-[93m50[0m [93mexhibits[0m a [93mhigh[0m [93mresponse[0m of [93m4[0m.[93m62[0m to [93m55[0m.[93m04[0m [93mppm[0m [93m2[0m-[93mheptanone[0m at [93mroom[0m [93mtemperature[0m, with [93mexcellent[0m [93mselectivity[0m and [93mstability[0m. The [93mUV[0m-[93mirradiated[0m [93mWT[0m-[93m50[0m ([93mWT[0m-[93m50Z[0m) [93mdemonstrates[0m [93mmore[0m [93msignificant[0m [93mperformance[0m [93menhancement[0m, with a [93mresponse[0m of [93m6[0m.[93m54[0m, which is [93mtwice[0m that of [93mWT[0m-[93m50[0m ([93m3[0m.[93m25[0m), and [93mnotably[0m [93mimproved[0m [93mselectivity[0m. [93mMechanistic[0m [93mstudies[0m [93mreveal[0m that the [93mperformance[0m [93mimprovements[0m of [93mAgWT[0m-[93m50[0m and [93mWT[0m-[93m50Z[0m [93moriginate[0m from [93mincreased[0m [93moxygen[0m [93mvacancies[0m [93minduced[0m by [93mAg[0m [93mnanoparticle[0m [93mloading[0m and [93mUV[0m-[93minduced[0m [93mhigh[0m-[93menergy[0m [93mhot[0m [93melectrons[0m and [93melevated[0m [93mphotogenerated[0m [93mcarrier[0m [93mconcentration[0m, [93mrespectively[0m. [93mFinally[0m, the [93mfabricated[0m [93msensor[0m was [93msuccessfully[0m [93mapplied[0m to [93mevaluate[0m the [93mfreshness[0m of [93msalmon[0m, [93mestablishing[0m a [93mfood[0m [93mquality[0m [93mmonitoring[0m [92mmodel[0m [93mbased[0m on [93mgas[0m-[93msensing[0m [93mresponses[0m. This [93mstudy[0m [93mprovides[0m a [93mnew[0m [93mstrategy[0m for [93mdeveloping[0m [93mroom[0m-[93mtemperature[0m [93mhigh[0m-[93mperformance[0m [93mgas[0m [93msensors[0m, [93mshowing[0m [93msignificant[0m [93mapplication[0m [93mpotential[0m in [93mfood[0m [93mquality[0m [93mcontrol[0m, [93mpublic[0m [93mhealth[0m [93mprotection[0m, and [93menvironmental[0m [93msafety[0m [93mfields[0m.
